front.title: What does the pixel measure?

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: The pixel is often used as a unit of measurement in information technology. Unfortunately, there is not a simple, consistently-applicable answer to what it is a measure of. This report analyzes the pixel unit through the lens of metrology and shows how one entity, the pixel, actually gives rise to a group of different units.
